law.text:
In addition to any other right to request a hearing under this subtitle and notwithstanding any provisions of the franchise agreement to the contrary, a dealer, designated dealer successor as provided in § 15-211.1 of this subtitle, manufacturer, distributor, or factory branch may request a hearing under Title 12, Subtitle 2 of this article to:
Resolve a dispute under any provision of this title between a dealer or a designated dealer successor and a manufacturer, distributor, or factory branch; or
Seek clarification or interpretation of any provision of this subtitle.
